com.joliciel.talismane.stats

Class DBSCANClusterer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.stats.DBSCANClusterer<T>

  • public class DBSCANClusterer<T>
extends Object
    Performs clustering on a dataset using the DBSCAN algorithm and Euclidean distance for similarity.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DBSCANClusterer(List<T> objectSet, List<double[]> dataSet)
      Constructor

    • Constructor Detail

      • DBSCANClusterer

        public DBSCANClusterer(List<T> objectSet,
                       List<double[]> dataSet)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        objectSet - the objects to be clustered
        dataSet - the data vectors describing the objects to be clustered - clustering will be performed using the Euclidean distance data vectors

    • Method Detail

      • cluster

        public Set<Set<T>> cluster(double epsilon,
                           int minPoints,
                           boolean includeNoise)
        Performs a cluster
        Parameters:
        epsilon - the maximum distance for including two points in the same cluster
        minPoints - the minimum points required to form a cluster
        includeNoise - whether or not noise should be included when returning the clusters
